channel.title: Black Mesa Store - Unofficial
channel.description:
I decided to do a few things in Photoshop for fun related to Black Mesa, That could be like products:
Black Mesa T Front:
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
BM T Back:
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Black Mesa Basketball - Large:
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Black Mesa Soda Can:
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Black Mesa Stylish Mouse Pad:
![](upload://yOOxZSdPo31FQoMZGuQTxD3Wtva.png)
Give me some more ideas. :smiley:

item.title: Black Mesa Store - Unofficial
item.dc:creator: zkee
item.description:
It’s funny - I have this custom BM t-shirt (grey shirt with a 20cm/7.5" BM logo ironed onto the chest), never expected anyone to ever publicly recognise it, let alone react on it

last saturday, I was walking around this yearly big city festival where I’m from, going under a bridge, and this guy who may have had one too many beers already, barely manages not to fall over the railing above me, shouting ‘HAAAAAALFFF-LLLIIIIIIIIIIFEEEEE whooohoooo!’ waving his beercan …

well, that’s what I gathered from it, since I didn’t really pay attention to him (I tend to overlook drunks or drunk-looking folks - even though it’s kinda hard on festivals like these :retard it was actually my wife who attended me to the fact that the above guy may have been referring to my shirt. whatever.

What I mean is, you wear this t-shirt, not thinking anyone will ever ask you about it. and once it does happen, what will you say? yeah, I’m a fan. - Fan of what? - Of a game that’s yet to come out, but a BIG fan nonetheless

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Store - Unofficial
item.dc:creator: Tree-line
item.description:
RockinRabbi:

From what I have read, this is also the reason that the mod is going to be free. Has anyone considered selling a premium subscription(with a one-time fee) to the site which gives access to any mods created by the Black Mesa team? According to my very limited knowledge, I believe this would allow you all to collect the money without any legal issues. You guys have worked hard, and I want to pay

SHHHHHHUT UP. They’re gonna make us pay if you say that!

I AM HAPPY WITH GETTING FREE STUFF. :3

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Store - Unofficial
item.dc:creator: RockinRabbi
item.description:
BlackStamp:

Don’t think we’re allowed to sell copyrighted material, or we would have had an official Black Mesa store set up a loooooong time ago.

From what I have read, this is also the reason that the mod is going to be free. Has anyone considered selling a premium subscription(with a one-time fee) to the site which gives access to any mods created by the Black Mesa team? According to my very limited knowledge, I believe this would allow you all to collect the money without any legal issues. You guys have worked hard, and I want to pay

Read full topic
